format: 
  dashboard:
    orientation: columns
server: shiny
---
  
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

# Main Content

## Column {width=60%}

### Chart

```{r}
plotOutput("histogram")
```

### Controls

```{r}
#| content: card
sliderInput("bins", "Number of bins:", min = 1, max = 50, value = 30)
```

## Column {width=40%}

### Statistics

```{r}
#| content: card
textOutput("stats")
```

```{r}
#| context: server

output$histogram <- renderPlot({
  hist(faithful$waiting,
       breaks = input$bins,
       col = 'steelblue',
       border = 'white',
       main = 'Old Faithful Geyser Waiting Times')
})

output$stats <- renderText({
  paste("Mean waiting time:", round(mean(faithful$waiting), 1),
        "minutes\nNumber of observations:", length(faithful$waiting))
})
```
